skilllist.skilldesc: Harith gains insight from his Key. He gains 7% Hybrid Lifesteal for each nearby enemy hero, stacking up to 35%.

Harith creates a phantom of himself in a distant location. Harith and his phantom will then release <font color="a6aafb">Synchro Fission</font> toward each other, dealing 200<font color="62f8fe"> (+80% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to all enemy units on the path. When the 2 energy waves collide, an explosion occurs, dealing 500<font color="62f8fe"> (+200% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to all enemies in the explosion area.

Harith dashes towards the target direction, gaining a 120<font color="62f8fe"> (+130% Total Magic Power)</font> shield and enhancing his next Basic Attack. Harith's enhanced Basic Attack deals 225<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Total Physical Attack)</font><font color="62f8fe">(+100% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> and slows enemies by 40%. Hitting an enemy with Harith's enhanced Basic Attack reduces the cooldown of <font color="a6aafb">Chrono Dash</font> by 3s.

Harith uses his Key to summon the Zaman Force. When the multidimensional rift appears, the cooldown of <font color="a6aafb">Chrono Dash</font> is reduced by 4s. The rift initially slows enemy heroes in the area by 50%, and will continuously slow enemy heroes by 15% afterwards.
If Harith comes into contact with the rift using <font color="a6aafb">Chrono Dash</font>, he will absorb the energy within and reduce the cooldown of <font color="a6aafb">Synchro Fission</font> by 1s and <font color="a6aafb">Chrono Dash</font> by 3s.
Harith gains 15% Resilience while on the rift.

data.name: Harith

__data.skilldesc:
Deal 520 (+80*Hero Level) <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> to the target Creep or Minion.
<font color="62f8fe">Passive</font>: Increases Creep rewards by 60% and reduces damage taken from basic Creeps by 40%. Also grants 15% additional Damage Reduction in the allied jungle during the first 2 min. Cannot share Minion rewards with allied heroes in the first 5 min.
<font color="62f8fe">Blessing:</font> Accumulate 5 Creep kills, hero kills, or assists to upgrade the spell according to the Jungling Boots' Blessing, and <Num9> kills or assists to gain <Num10> Physical Attack and Magic Power and <Num11> Max HP.
__data.skilldesc_text: Deal <Num1> [C5True Damage] to the target Creep or Minion.####[C2Passive]: Increases Creep rewards by <%Num2> and reduces damage taken from basic Creeps by <%Num3>. Also grants <%Num5> additional Damage Reduction in the allied jungle during the first <Num4> min. Cannot share Minion rewards with allied heroes in the first <Num6> min.####[C2Blessing:] Accumulate <Num8> Creep kills, hero kills, or assists to upgrade the spell according to the Jungling Boots' Blessing, and <Num9> kills or assists to gain <Num10> Physical Attack and Magic Power and <Num11> Max HP.
__data.skilldescemblem:
Deal 520 (+80*Hero Level) <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> to the target Creep or Minion.
<font color="62f8fe">Passive</font>: Increases Creep rewards by 60% and reduces damage taken from basic Creeps by 40%. Also grants 15% additional Damage Reduction in the allied jungle during the first 2 min. Cannot share Minion rewards with allied heroes in the first 5 min.
<font color="62f8fe">Blessing:</font> Accumulate 5 Creep kills, hero kills, or assists to upgrade the spell according to the Jungling Boots' Blessing, and <Num9> kills or assists to gain <Num10> Physical Attack and Magic Power and <Num11> Max HP.

+5% Cooldown Reduction

emblemskill.skilldesc: Equipment can be purchased at 95% of their base price.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Equipment can be purchased at <%Num1> of their base price.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Equipment can be purchased at 95% of their base price.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Dealing damage greater than 7% of an enemy hero's Max HP 3 times within 5s will scorch the target for an additional 162-750 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Damage</font> (scales with level).

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 15s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Dealing damage greater than <%Num3> of an enemy hero's Max HP <Num2> times within <Num1>s will scorch the target for an additional <Num5> [ffdfa2]Adaptive Damage[-] (scales with level).########[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num6>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Dealing damage greater than 7% of an enemy hero's Max HP 3 times within 5s will scorch the target for an additional 162-750 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Damage</font> (scales with level).

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 15s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Crisis: In 3s after using the skill, the caster's next Basic Attack will apply additional 100<font color="62f8fe"> (+1 Total Magic Power)</font> True Damage with a cooldown of 1.5s. Then briefly gains 10% Movement Speed.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Crisis: In 3s after using the skill, the caster's next Basic Attack will apply additional 100<font color="62f8fe"> (+1 Total Magic Power)</font> True Damage with a cooldown of 1.5s. Then briefly gains 10% Movement Speed.
equiplist.equiptips:
+70 Magic Power
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+8% Hybrid Lifesteal
+6 Mana Regen

equiplist.equipskill1: Affliction: Each Basic Attack deals extra 50<font color="62f8fe"> (+0.3 Total Magic Power)</font> Magic Damage.
equiplist.equipskill2: Impulse: Basic Attacks grant 6% extra Attack Speed for 3s, capped at 5 stacks.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Affliction: Each Basic Attack deals extra 50<font color="62f8fe"> (+0.3 Total Magic Power)</font> Magic Damage.
Impulse: Basic Attacks grant 6% extra Attack Speed for 3s, capped at 5 stacks.
equiplist.equiptips:
+55 Magic Power
+20% Extra Attack Speed
+10% Lifesteal
+5% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Mystery: Gains 21%-35% extra Magic Power (scales with level).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Mystery: Gains 21%-35% extra Magic Power (scales with level).

equiplist.equipskill1: Recharge: Increases Magic Power by 5 after dealing Magic Damage (this effect stacks up to 6 times and can only gain 1 stack every 0.4s). When reaching full stacks, increases Magic Damage by 12% for 5s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Recharge: Increases Magic Power by 5 after dealing Magic Damage (this effect stacks up to 6 times and can only gain 1 stack every 0.4s). When reaching full stacks, increases Magic Damage by 12% for 5s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+20% Hybrid Lifesteal
+70 Magic Power
+400 Extra Max HP

equiplist.equipskill1: Spellbreaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Magic Penetration for each point of the enemy's Magic Defense, capped at 20%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Spellbreaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Magic Penetration for each point of the enemy's Magic Defense, capped at 20%.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Dealing damage with skills deals 4% of target's Max HP as extra <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Damage</font> and restores 2% Mana on hit.

<font color="8098ab">If the hero does not use Mana, recovers 1% HP instead. The extra Adaptive Damage dealt to non-hero units is up to 120</font>.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 5s</font>

The extra Adaptive Damage dealt to non-hero units is up to <Num5>[-].########[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num3>s[-]

recommendmasterplan.name: TS - HIKO
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

data.story: Leonin boy who came to the Moniyan Empire from Azrya.

assist.desc: Harith pairs well with heroes who have AOE CC and can make it harder for enemies to escape his Ultimate's range, such as Minsitthar and Minotaur.

strong.desc: Harith is a very agile hero and his Ultimate reduces the duration of control effects, so he is excellent at countering heroes who rely on CC and have relatively long casting animations, like Belerick and Johnson.

weak.desc: Harith is countered by heroes who can quickly escape from his Ultimate, such as Novaria and Pharsa.
